title: Gibson Elite Lilith 16 Piece Dinnerware Set with Embossed Dots, Ruby Red
features: Embossed dots add elegance to your dinner table
Made of stoneware to enhance durability
description: The Gibson Elite Lilith pattern features a traditional round rim shape with a modern embossed dot pattern. The transparent glaze on the stoneware gives the surface a glow as light bounces on the surface. The beautiful color jumps out with the light edge of cream on the very edge of each piece. A beautiful dinnerware set to add sophistication and grace to any table setting.
